text_block_list.text:
That day, Narita Brian was struck by pain in the leg and was 
immediately diagnosed at the hospitalー

The result was arthritis of the groin. I was notified that she 
might not be able to run for several months.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hehehe～… I really ran! Let's take a break～.
That's right. Let's rest for 5 minutes before starting practice.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…That's right, the spring “Emperor Prize” is getting closer, and 
the number of reporters has increased again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if Brian-san, who was originally scheduled to run, has 
also attracted a lot of coverage…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Fortunately it wasn't a serious injury, still 
it would be better to rest in spring.
Yeah…
Yeah…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
She can rest a little. Let's go on a 
rampage when the injury is healed!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oy, Trainer!
What's wrong, you're in such a hurry?
What's wrong, you're in such a hurry?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It's not time for what's wrong! Brian this girl, isn't she 
injured!? And yet, she is training in the gym…!
Huh…!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Phew.
Brian…!? You're hurt so why!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It was the leg that was injured. Other places 
are perfect, there is no problem.
That's true, but…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I will do it because there is something I can do. It will be hard 
to win, a race is not something sweet, and you know that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: And I'm racing to win. …To run ahead of anyone.

Narita Brian always has a strong desire to run. 
Even when she is injured, her feelings do not 
seem to have changed in the slightest…

Even so, I'm still worried. If it gets to 
worse, I'll choose not to let you run.

Even so, I'm still worried. If it gets to 
worse, I'll choose not to let you run.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Then, do you want to stop this training too?

…No, the role of the Trainer is to support the Horse Girl. I want 
to respect your feelings more than anything else.

…No, the role of the Trainer is to support the Horse Girl. I want 
to respect your feelings more than anything else.

So, I will also take care of the training during 
the injury. We can explore what we can do together 
and prepare for the return race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph… Understood.

Thus began a special training session 
with Narita Brian, who can't run.

The inner muscle can be trained by doing trunk training. 
While you can not put a load on the joints, try to 
suppress muscle weakness with this.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Ahh… This is the end of the 3 sets. How 
much longer are we going to do?
While taking a break, I think about 6 more sets.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Then, let's go with 3 times that.
Huh…!? 3 Times!?

The pain seems to be gone, but it's still too early 
to run. So from today, let's use the muscles of 
the legs in the pool with a low load.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I got it, then let's tie a tire to my body and swim.
Tire…?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It increases water resistance, right?? What I want to do is not 
maintain muscle strength, but to increase it.
I mean, It's an idea like you. All right, let's do it!
I mean, It's an idea like you. All right, let's do it!
Starting today, it's training to actually run!
Starting today, it's training to actually run!

Even though I said that, it's not time to run 
seriously. Let's get used to the course by slowly 
flowing dirt which is less burdensome.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …You've been with me since I got hurt, is that okay?
I'm watching everyone else, don't worry.

Also, your training is just like racing, 
it's something that I enjoy watching.

Also, your training is just like racing, 
it's something that I enjoy watching.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…If you're having fun watching the training, 
that changes everything. If so, I will ask you 
to stay with me until the sun goes down.
There is no compromise at all in Narita Brian dictionary.

The reason that many fans are attracted to her is 
not just that she is strong, but it may be because 
of her desire to aim for victory itself.

Finally, the day came when Narita Brian 
joined the regular training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've been waiting for you, Brian! You 
must have wanted to take the plunge!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Did the doctor tell it was okay…?

Yeah, I was told that the inflammation completely subsided and 
there was no problem.

Yeah, I was told that the inflammation completely subsided and 
there was no problem.

And I've been with Brian all the time, she doesn't feel any pain, 
she doesn't have to worry about getting hurt.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alright! Let's run now!! Brian is out on the field!!

I've been watching your training so far and I've been reminded 
again of your feelings for victory.

I've been watching your training so far and I've been reminded 
again of your feelings for victory.

Gorsi already said it, but I've waited a long time for this day 
too! You couldn't run until today, so take the plunge and run!

Gorsi already said it, but I've waited a long time for this day 
too! You couldn't run until today, so take the plunge and run!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Needless to say…!
With that said, Narita Brian went to the course vigorously.

What kind of race will she show us in the 
fallー I couldn't help but hope for that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's not that easy… Is that what it means?
